inProgress.description: Ваша транзакция выполняется. Подтверждение может занять несколько минут

success.description: Ваша транзакция прошла успешно. Спасибо за ваш вклад

registeringUser.description: By clicking "Sign and Send" below, your agreement to the Moonbeam Crowdloan Terms and Conditions will be stored on chain, to your DOT account. This will be in the form of a remark extrinstic signed by your account.
registeringUser.feeNote: Please note that this signing transaction will be subject to transaction fees on the Polkadot network (around 0.0411 DOT), and Polkadot has a minimum balance of 1 DOT.
